Test Case Description: Test all main navigation menu items
Expected Result: All menu items direct to correct pages
All footer links work and direct to correct pages

Test Case Description: Verify logo redirects to home page
Expected Result: Logo click returns user to homepage
Appropriate error or no results message shown
User is notified to enter search terms
All product images are visible and properly sized

Test Case Description: Test product links to detail pages
Expected Result: Links direct to correct product detail pages
Prices display in correct format with currency symbol

Test Case Description: Verify menu collapse functionality on mobile
Expected Result: Menu collapses and expands correctly on mobile
Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously
Products sort correctly by ascending price
Products sort correctly by descending price

Test Case Description: Verify correct item count per page
Expected Result: Item count matches selected display count
Items per page can be changed

Test Case Description: Toggle between grid and list views
Verify display consistency in both views
Expected Result: Product information consistent in both views

Test Case Description: Verify all product details display correctly

Expected Result: Product can be added to cart
Product with options can be added to cart
Related products are relevant to main product
Multiple products can be added to cart
Products can be removed from cart

Test Case Description: Verify cart merging for logged-in users
Expected Result: Guest cart merges with user cart on login
Checkout button directs to checkout process

Test Case Description: Test complete checkout flow as guest
Test checkout with saved payment methods
Expected Result: Saved payment methods can be selected

Test Case Description: Test error handling for declined payments

Expected Result: Order summary matches cart contents and totals

Test Case Description: Test edit functionality from review page
Expected Result: Order can be edited from review page
New accounts can be created successfully

Test Case Description: Test adding products to wish list
Expected Result: Products can be added to wish list
Products with options can be added to wish list
Items can be removed from wish list
Items can be moved from wish list to cart
